[[Category:Quests]][[Category:Crafting]][[Category:Housing]] __TOC__ == Quest Start == In order to begin crafting you must first create a soul forge which requires '''120 [[Blacksmithing]] / 120 [[Tinkering]] and the [[Legendary Hammer]]''' to even start the quest. Quest Giver can be found at the '''Public Britain Library''' [[File:BritLib.PNG|275px|Brit Library]] '''After completing the Quest and Crafting your Soul Forge you can then start collecting recipes which drop from Champion Spawns randomly similar to power scrolls.''' [[File:CompletedSoulforge2.PNG|275px|Completed Soulforge]] '''Recipes also now drop from paragon chests.''' [[File:BlueprintParagonChest.PNG|275px|Paragon Chest Blueprint]] If you have 120 [[Blacksmithing]] and 120 [[Tinkering]] and the [[Legendary Hammer]] talk to the quest giver by saying "Quest" or by double clicking him and he will give you a book with instructions on how to begin your quest so that you may craft your Soul Forge. [[File:QuestStart.PNG|275px|Quest NPC]] == Step One - Legendary Hammer == As mentioned you will first need to collect shards and create the [[Legendary Hammer]]. It will require that you collect 10 ancient smithing hammer shards. Once constructed you will be able to double click the hammer to see directions to find the quest giver in the '''Public Britain Library''' File:LegendaryHammer.PNG|Legendary Hammer & Shards File:LegendaryHammerText.PNG|Hammer Quest Text Once you return to the quest NPC with a completed hammer and double click him or say "quest" the quest box will come up. You will need to make sure the hammer is in your main bag layer. Once you hit okay he will place a notepad into your backpack and set you off onto the second step toward a soulforge. File:LegendaryHammerQuestPromptQ1.PNG|Soulforge Quest File:NotepadQ2.PNG|Quest Notepad == Step Two - Locating the scrolls == For the next part of the quest the NPC has tasks you with locating 5 different scrolls in various dungeons that will move you into the third part of the quest chain. The scrolls are located in the dungeons of Deciet, Destard, Fire, Hythloth, and Shame(Mage Tower by Poison Elementals) File:DecietScroll.PNG|Deciet Scroll File:DestardScroll.PNG|Destard Scroll File:FireScroll.PNG|Fire Scroll File:HythlothScrolll.PNG|Hythloth Scroll File:ShameScroll.PNG|Shame Scroll File:DecietScroll2Q4.PNG|Deciet Scroll Text File:DestardScroll2Q4.PNG|Destard Scroll Text File:FireScroll2Q4.PNG|Fire Scroll Text File:HythlothScroll2Q4.PNG|Hythloth Scroll Text File:ShameScroll2Q4.PNG|Shame Scroll Text == Step Three - Transcribe notebook & Collect Materials == Once you have located all the scrolls your notepad will show five collected. [[File:NotepadProgress.PNG|275px|Notepad progress]] You will then be able to return to the quest NPC and double click him to progress further. [[File:FurtherNotesQ5.PNG|275px|Updated Notepad]] [[File:FurtherNotes2Q5.PNG|275px|Additional Updates]] Now that your notebook is complete you will be able to validate the materials needed by double clicking the [[Legendary Hammer]]. It will bring up a quest window again with updated information that you had the NPC update just before. [[File:SoulforgeResourcesQ6.PNG|275px|Material list]] Once collected the materials should look like this and '''NEED TO BE PLACED IN YOUR MAIN BAG LAYER AND DRAGON BONES SEPERATED ONE BY ONE''' You will need 20 dragon bone shards, 2 intacted dragon hearts, 1 heart of rikktor, 1 soul of the harrower, 1 soul of the devourer, the notepad, and finally the [[Legendary Hammer]] [[File:SoulforgeResources2Q6.PNG|275px|Soulforge Materials]] == Step Four - Complete the Soulforge == Now that you have collected all the needed materials and have them in your '''MAIN BAG LAYER AND BONE SHARDS SEPERATED ONE BY ONE''' you will be able to complete the Soulforge. You must pick out a place in your home that has available '''4x4 space''' that you will target. Now that you are ready and have an available spot for placement you will double click the [[Legendary Hammer]] and target the area you want it to be with the available space. It will then complete the soulforge! File:SoulforgeCompleteJournalQ7.PNG|'''Journal Text'''
